title: Tasty Manchatti Chicken Masala Recipe
content:
Spicy and flavourful manchatti chicken masala which tastes super delicious with rice, roti or naan. This is so easy to make and taste amazing.

When I was looking for dinner inspiration online, I came across a picture of a spicy chicken curry served with some naan. I got so inspired by that so I made it almost immediately.

 

Manchatti Chicken Masala Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 45 mins

Total time: 55 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Chicken - 500 grams

Coconut Oil - 4 tablespoons

Onions - 2 large sliced thinly

Green Chillies - 2

Ginger Garlic Paste - 2 tablespoons

Kashmiri Chilli Powder - 1 tablespoon

Coriander Powder - 1 tablespoon

Chicken Masala Powder - 2 tablespoons

Tomato - 4 large chopped finely

Curry Leaves a handful

Water as needed

Salt to taste

Coriander Leaves - a handful chopped finely

 

Instructions

Heat oil in a pot.

Add in onions, chilies and cook till golden.

Add in ginger garlic paste and saute for a min.

Add in tomatoes and cook till mushy.

Add in spice powders and mix well.

Add in salt and mix well.

Add in chicken, curry leaves and mix well.

Cover and cook on low heat till chicken is done.

Add in water and bring it to a boil. Simmer for 10 mins.

Add coriander leaves.

Serve it.

recommendations.content:

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
